name: v1.4.0
body:
## What’s Changed

- #117 - Add MQTT client util (@MartinHjelmare)
- #104 - Add instance id message filter (@MartinHjelmare)
- #113 - Bump pydocstyle from 5.0.2 to 5.1.1 (@dependabot)
- #114 - Bump paho-mqtt from 1.5.0 to 1.5.1 (@dependabot)
- #115 - Bump pytest from 5.4.1 to 6.1.2 (@dependabot)
- #116 - Bump pylint from 2.4.4 to 2.6.0 (@dependabot)
- #111 - Bump pytest-timeout from 1.3.4 to 1.4.2 (@dependabot)
- #108 - Bump black from 19.10b0 to 20.8b1 (@dependabot)
- #110 - Bump mypy from 0.770 to 0.790 (@dependabot)
- #112 - Bump tox from 3.14.6 to 3.20.1 (@dependabot)
- #109 - Bump pytest-cov from 2.8.1 to 2.10.1 (@dependabot)
- #107 - Bump flake8 from 3.7.9 to 3.8.4 (@dependabot)
- #106 - Add dependabot for pip packages (@MartinHjelmare)
- #105 - Fix association typo (@MartinHjelmare)

name: v0.0.4
body:
## What’s Changed

* Updated publish release to pypi workflow

## What’s Changed

- #36 - Update setup.py (@cgarwood)

## What’s Changed

- #35 - Prepare for initial release to PyPI (@cgarwood)
- #33 - Add send_value function to OZWValue (@cgarwood)
- #34 - Update description in setup.py (@cgarwood)
- #32 - Convert item_id to int (@balloob)
- #31 - Fix some typos (@balloob)
- #28 - Add values property to OZWNode to return all values of a node (@cgarwood)
- #29 - Add collection iterators (@balloob)
- #27 - Fix tests (@cgarwood)
- #25 - Add topic property (@balloob)
- #24 - Add node child helper (@balloob)
- #23 - Verify from dump (@balloob)
- #21 - Add command class constants (@cgarwood)
- #22 - Fix default topic and dump script line break handling (@cgarwood)
- #20 - Add support for dumping MQTT and reading from file (@balloob)
- #19 - Fix value (@cgarwood)
- #18 - Start adding instance commands (@cgarwood)
- #17 - Add OZWInstanceStatistics with properties (@cgarwood)
- #16 - Add support to hold messages until parent has data (@balloob)
- #14 - Update for new topic format (@cgarwood)
- #12 - Extra test (@balloob)
- #11 - Add support for direct collections (@balloob)
- #10 - Track parent object (@balloob)
- #6 - Add OZWNodeStatistics for handling node communication stats (@cgarwood)
- #5 - Change /values/ topic to /value/ (@cgarwood)
- #3 - Add config for Travis CI (@cgarwood)
- #2 - Add OZWValue properties (@cgarwood)
- #1 - Refactor lib + add tests (@balloob)
